forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, then becoming windy with partial clearing for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
